comment.author: 35133479@N08
comment._content: Looks a bit like a super hero.

comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: A Yale grad, Howard Harding Jones (1885-1941) coached the Yale football team in 1909 and again in 1913. His longest coaching stint was sixteen seasons at USC (1925-40), where his teams won the Rose Bowl game several times. He died at age 55.. en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Howard_Jones_(American_football_coach)
